description: This file implements the message-receiving functions for the STUN (Session Traversal Utilities for NAT) protocol in a Simple Client context. It includes handlers for processing responses and error messages from the STUN server, as well as verifying message integrity. The primary focus is on managing incoming messages related to binding responses and errors, updating internal state accordingly, and ensuring message authenticity.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingResponse1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Processes an incoming binding response message, updates binding info, and resets client state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingResponseA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Processes an incoming binding response on socket A, updating binding info and signaling event.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingResponseB(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Handles responses on socket B; in this implementation, logs receipt and ignores.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingErrorResponse1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Processes error responses, handling unauthorized errors by rediscovering binding and resetting state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingErrorResponseA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Handles error responses for socket A, especially unauthorized errors, and resets socket state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS StunScoRecvBindingErrorResponseB(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Handles error responses for socket B, resets socket state, and logs receipt.

methods.name: BOOL StunScoVerifyMsgIntegrity(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Verifies incoming message integrity using HMAC-SHA1, comparing with the message's integrity attribute.
